headline.main: SHORT DENOUNCES WILLKIE IN HOUSE; Challenges Republicans to Take Stand '40 Candidate Is 'Unfit to Lead Party'

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 6 -- A violent attack on Wendell L. Willkie for his attitude on foreign affairs was made in the House today by Representative Short, Republican, of Missouri. It was applauded for a minute by the Republican side and even some Democrats joined in, urging that Mr. Short receive more time.
abstract: Repr Short seeks to rule Willkie out of Repub party for stand; Willkie comments
